content.rendered:
Photo via Unsplash

This Week in Genesis: NASA and Genesis, a new theme from StudioPress, and some of my favourite people in Genesis and beyond jump on podcasts together.

Themes

Another week, another new and awesome theme from the folks over at StudioPress.

This one’s a little different, called Smart Passive Income Pro, it was developed in conjunction with Pat Flynn who many of you will know from his Smart Passive Income podcast.

We worked closely w/ @PatFlynn to develop the new Smart Passive Income Pro theme https://t.co/I5VyZpKazd #genesiswp pic.twitter.com/6jNX56ZJks

— StudioPress (@studiopress) August 11, 2016

And, while on the subject of themes, if you’re a fan of Ryan Townley’s work over at Minimal Genesis you might want to grab his lifetime, all themes deal before the prices goes up soon!

Grab the 'Lifetime All Themes' package before the new ecommerce theme drops & the price goes up >>> https://t.co/qEPkApPgQQ #genesiswp

— Minimal Genesis (@minimalgenesis) August 11, 2016

Showcase

Did you know NASA runs a Genesis site? I didn’t. Huge hat tip to Kostas Nicolacopoulo and Sal Ferrarello on that one. Check it out at wordpress.grc.nasa.gov

They also maintain a list of supported and recommended plugins! https://t.co/cdB1gx27Eh @NASA @dimensionmedia https://t.co/SHQZx2tF6p

— Kostas Nicolacopoulo (@KostasNi) August 10, 2016

@KostasNi Very cool resource and insight plus they use #genesiswp @NASA @dimensionmedia

— Sal Ferrarello (@salcode) August 10, 2016

Away from NASA, Elsa M is on a minimal design tip for roseottdesign.com

Excited to share new design for Rose Ott Design. Loved the clean + minimal new look. #genesiswp #webdesign #customwp pic.twitter.com/Qmai5hYbXk

— Elsa M (@emrdesignstudio) August 11, 2016

Cami MacNamara for chiekowatanabe.com

New website by Webcami using Hello Pro theme @rachelgogos @studiopress #genesiswp https://t.co/WyjdGkOn3v pic.twitter.com/fLxURq8niy

— Cami MacNamara (@webcami) August 8, 2016

Peter Shilling with a tasty looking site for Careel Bay Honey

New #WordPress site today for @careel_bay_honey_co #genesiswp pic.twitter.com/fswR85kL3F

— Peter Shilling (@PShilling) August 12, 2016

Nice use of Simple Pro Themes’ Sunshine Pro theme by Jesse Lindebjerg for ds-doha.de/en/

Cool work by Jesper – Professional multi-lang school site on Sunshine Pro #genesiswp theme – https://t.co/f8uXdCvYiQ pic.twitter.com/sz04IEf24p

— Simple Pro Themes (@SimpleProThemes) August 8, 2016

Podcasts

If you haven’t checked it out already, make sure you tune in to new Genesis podcast StudioPress.fm this week where they’re disucssing Lauren Mancke’s story.

Here’s episode #2 of StudioPress FM where we discuss @laurenmancke’s story — https://t.co/pOnF6uXmxG #genesiswp pic.twitter.com/yqCfFHBR20

— StudioPress (@studiopress) August 10, 2016

And you’ll also want to check out the Genesis community’s finest Carrie Dils chatting to Jon Nastor over at OfficeHours.fm (and, if you dig that, you can also catch Jonny’s podcast with Carrie over at his site too!)

My new sounds: Hack the Entrepreneur, Episode 114 https://t.co/qZjIbDcGlS on #SoundCloud

— Office Hours Podcast (@officehoursfm) August 11, 2016

Oh and Carrie’s OfficeHours.fm community is now free too!

Did you know that the @officehoursfm community is now free? @cdils explains why: https://t.co/noQQx9TelW

— Kostas Nicolacopoulo (@KostasNi) August 9, 2016

Tutorials

Sridhar Katakam with his usual array of tutorials, including:

  • How to replace Genesis Responsive Slider in Kickstart Pro with Soliloquy slider
  • How to set height of After Header section to Viewport height in Interior Pro
  • How to make last widget in the sidebar sticky on scroll in Genesis
  • Side by side images Landing page with centered widget areas in Genesis
  • Thumbnail Grid with Expanding Preview in a Widget Area in Genesis
  • How to add font icons before navigation menu items in Genesis using Dashicons
  • Feature boxes in Genesis with Hover animations
  • How to automatically add first, last and numbered classes to widgets in WordPress

How to replace Genesis Responsive Slider in Kickstart Pro with Soliloquy slider:https://t.co/VG5vnxJ0fV pic.twitter.com/ga0IjMi1Fw

— Sridhar Katakam (@srikat) August 11, 2016

Chinmoy Paul on:

  • dividing the site footer into two widget areas…
  • and how to remove “Archives for” text from date archive title.

Free content: How to remove “Archives for” text from date archive title? https://t.co/zwwYUkqOap via genesisdevelopr #genesiswp

— Genesis Developer (@genesisdevelopr) August 8, 2016

Joshua David Nelson on adding CPT Archive Settings Metaboxes in Genesis.

New Post: Adding #GenesisFramework CPT Archive Settings Metaboxes https://t.co/rC4prTO7a5 #WordPress #genesiswp

— Joshua David Nelson (@steadystater) August 9, 2016

Ginger Coolidge on how to change the number of posts on the Utility Pro theme homepage.

Another Utility Pro tut: How to change the number of posts on the homepage https://t.co/jmbSevLqti #genesiswp

— Ginger Coolidge (@gscoolidge) August 10, 2016

Best of the rest

Huge congrats to Nick Diego on breaking 10,000 users for his Genesis Columns Advanced plugin.

Genesis Columns Advanced finally broke 10,000 users…that makes me happy! https://t.co/woVWZNV0eH #WordPress #genesiswp

— Nick Diego (@nickmdiego) August 9, 2016

Scott Wyden Kivowitz on how to test site changes locally with Pressmatic (a new MAMP / Desktop Server alternative).

How To Test Site Changes Locally w/ @pressmaticwp https://t.co/cmH5Lb6xbF #WordPress #GenesisWP pic.twitter.com/yuTM06I9D5

— Scott Wyden Kivowitz (@scottwyden) August 11, 2016

And finally…

Just a reminder, as WordPress 4.6 draws closer, if you didn’t already you should update all of your WordPress websites to Genesis 2.3.1 and ask your clients to do the same.

By not doing so you risk an error on those sites as soon as WordPress updates to 4.6, so don’t delay!

This is a Must Read if you haven't updated to the latest version of #GenesisWP. @lindseyriel https://t.co/iiq6V8C637

— Susan Ramsey (@onehappystudio) August 11, 2016

If however a 4.6 update sneaks through before updating Genesis though,
Sal Ferrarello’s written this handy guide to getting things working again.

Catchable fatal error: Argument 1 passed to Genesis_Admin_CPT_Archive_Settings

—

That’s all for this week.

If you get any value out of This Week in Genesis please do share and subscribe below (if you don’t already) it really makes a huge difference.

Thanks and have stellar weekend.

PS Sending love and support this week especially to Tonya Mork, a great teacher, friend and human being.

excerpt.rendered: NASA and Genesis, a new theme from StudioPress, and some of my favourite people in Genesis and beyond jump on podcasts together.
